data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Debarca to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Debarca, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Debarca, North Macedonia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 9 believers in Debarca, North Macedonia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1 new simple churches in the state of Debarca, North Macedonia. Place a simple church in every community of the 5,600 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. Make the Albanian, Macedonian people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Debarca, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9 believers in Debarca, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 9 believers in Debarca that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
